sentences.cn: …一名替银行物色人才的猎头。

sentences.en: By lucky coincidence, Zhou Yi and the manager a headhunter company a love affair as well.
sentences.cn: 一次机缘巧合下, 周易与人才中介公司经理袁姗春风一度.

sentences.en: Conversely, the headhunter should not expect to match the firm's qualifications and expectations quickly and easily.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 猎头公司也不能指望很快、很容易地满足客户的要求和期望.

sentences.en: How he got the job : Recruited by a headhunter.
sentences.cn: 如何取得现在的职务: 被一位猎头发掘.

sentences.en: It is known that red is a headhunter to Simpson company as Marketing Manager.
sentences.cn: 据了解,瑞德是被猎头公司挖到辛普森公司去担任营销经理的.

sentences.en: She was approached by a headhunter and offered a job with another company.
sentences.cn: 一间人力仲介公司接洽她并提供另外一家公司的工作.

sentences.en: The board of directors hired a headhunter to get a new manager.
sentences.cn: 董事会雇佣了一位负责人才招聘的人去物色一位新经理.

sentences.en: Trea Tijmens, a former headhunter, founded the company called SuccessMatch in 2005.
sentences.cn: 特雷·提杰曼斯以前是一名猎头, 她2005年创办了这家名为“成功配对”的公司.

sentences.en: We are absolutely not the biggest, but we are certainly one of the fast developing headhunter.
sentences.cn: 我们绝非最大的猎头公司, 但是我们肯定是发展最快的猎头公司之一.

words.tran_cn: 头痛；麻烦；令人头痛之事

trans.tran_cn: 猎头，物色人才的人，（原始部落中）割取敌人首级作为战利品的人，<俚>清除政敌者
trans.tran_en: someone who finds people with the right skills and experience to do particular jobs, and who tries to persuade them to leave their present jobs
